isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - REMOVE

figure.caption: Figure 12. Air System Remove and Install

step1.para: Disconnect the white 1/8 inch O.D. supply line (A) from between the slave valve and the selector valve.
Disconnect the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line (B) from between the slave valve and the selector valve.
Disconnect the black 1/8 inch O.D. signal line (C) from between the selector valve and the intermediate shift cylinder.
Disconnect the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (D) from between the intermediate shift cylinder and the air filter/regulator assembly.
Disconnect the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (E) from between the slave valve and the air filter/regulator assembly.
Disconnect the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (F) from between the slave valve and the low range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder.
Disconnect the 1/4 inch I.D. supply line (G) from between the slave valve and the direct range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder.
